tweet_text: @smartkittymomo @benfrosh stopping is allowed. the camera moves with you. you can move in any 2d direction (subject to fixed walls in the map) until you choose to go through the door to the next cutscene. there is no time constraint. also, there are people you can optionally talk to.

tweet_text:
Difficulty in games was a tactic to make you spend quarters in arcades. Then when home consoles were introduced, difficulty became a way to pad game length to justify the price.

"Nintendo hard" was a marketing strategy not a test of skill
